body_html: I mean that it would be easier to build your own program hello_world.cpp using Bazel as well. From your error message it looks like you are using make all to build it, which is unsupported, but you might be able to set up your include path appropriately.
body_text: I mean that it would be easier to build your own program hello_world.cpp using Bazel as well. From your error message it looks like you are using make all to build it, which is unsupported, but you might be able to set up your include path appropriately.
body: I mean that it would be easier to build your own program `hello_world.cpp` using Bazel as well. From your error message it looks like you are using `make all` to build it, which is unsupported, but you might be able to set up your include path appropriately.
